Description: A mummy portrait of a young boy, with large eyes and curling hair, wearing a tunic and mantle; illustration to Pettigrew's "A History of Egyptian Mummies and an Acount of the Worship and Embalming of the Sacred Animals by the Egyptians" (1834) Etching
Curator's comments: A print of EA6713, in the museum's collection.
Bibliographic references: Reid 1871 / A descriptive catalogue of the works of George Cruikshank (1627)
Associated titles: A History of Egyptian Mummies and an Acount of the Worship and Embalming of the Sacred Animals by the Egyptians
